summary: Follow-up research on --sync vs --review integration. Found --sync in task.md provides basic bidirectional sync with git blame resolution. Designed --review as superset: --sync-only flag preserves existing behavior, adds validation/verification stages. Migration path: alias then deprecate.

artifacts.summary: Follow-up research analyzing current --sync implementation and designing --review as superset with backwards-compatible migration path

next_steps: Run /plan 601 to create implementation plan incorporating both research reports
